strings.Value: {n}Tirval frowns.{/n} "Greetings, my {mf|baron|baroness|King|Queen}! I heard a rumor that Daggermark, my accursed homeland, is trying to sink its claws into your lands. Damn it!"
"Good day, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! It seems that the war with Daggermark is boiling, is it not? I even see some in Varnhold nowdays. They're everywhere, I tell you!"
"I would like to make a contribution, to assist you in this war against those spying bastards. Here â€“ take this. And put it to good use!"
